location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 55 of 1855 from Henry Lacon Anderson, Secretary to the Government, Secret Department, Bombay to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication from the Resident (No. 1) dated 31 January 1855 concerning Bahrein [Bahrain], and the Wahabi Coast; it states that the Bombay Government approves of the Resident's proceedings outlined within.
